text: Walter Smith Bird (12 July 1891 – 2 March 1965) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1965 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Coalville Swifts F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Bristol Rovers F.C. players Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:Heart of Midlothian F.C. players Category:Kilmarnock F.C. players Category:Loughborough Corinthians F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:People from Hugglescote
title: Walter Bird (footballer)
